physical_appearance:This photograph shows the Molenvliet Canal in Noordwijk
 Batavia (Jakarta) in Indonesia. The wide canal stretches from the top-left to the forefront of the photograph. There are two small boats at the bottom-right of the photograph. There are several men by the boats sitting at the edge of the canal. The edges of the photographs are rounded. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

There are two small boats at the bottom-right of the photograph. There are several men by the boats sitting at the edge of the canal. The edges of the photographs are rounded. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
